name: Seeing Red (JoeDaFarmer)
description:
A monochromatic game, where you get a powerup which makes objects appear. Then you have to go back though the level or go forward with new obstacles.

Controls-

arrow keys or A and D to move ,

up or W to jump,

S or down arrow to look down

Other things-

The was my first game jam game, and first published game

If the game is laggy, try to download it

Credits-

Used some Kenny's game icons 

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/game-icons

For sound effects used bfxr

https://www.bfxr.net/

Music made with beepbox

https://beepbox.co/

Added apple and android phone versions

IOS might not work haven't tested yet, tell me in the comments if it doesn't
